content.value:
FREE Breakfast, internet & WiFi, local phone calls, Lockers, Linens and Duvets. Free Map, Colombian Coffee and Tea all day. And City tour.

Facilities: Tourist information, 24 hrs Reception and Hot showers,Guest kitchen, 42'LCD TV, DVD's, Satellite and Cable Tv, Book exchange, Fire place, Hammocks, Back yard and BBQ. New perfect mattresses!!!

Services: Mini Bar, Laundry service, Yoga, Kick Boxing, Spanish and Salsa classes, and dinner opción every night.

Alegrias hostel is located in La Candelaria, the main historical, cultural, and tourist area of Bogota. It's surrounded by the most important museums, the bests universities, restaurants, bars and clubs.

It is the perfect place if are looking for a really Colombian experience, in a beautiful, clean, comfortable and fun place, with just nice people.

A continental breakfast is available every morning at the guest house.
El Campin Stadium is 9 km from Alegrias Hostel Bogota, while T Zone is 13 km from the property.
Candelaria - Centro Historico is a great choice for travellers interested in museums, old town exploring and history.

description.description: Boasting a bar, garden and views of garden, Alegrias Hostel Bogota is set in Bogotá, 1.2 km from Luis Angel Arango Library. The property is around 2.2 km from Quevedo's Jet, 2.3 km from Bolivar Square and 8 km from Corferias International Exhibition Center. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, luggage storage space and free WiFi throughout the property
